title: Turning Points: Worktext in Economics
author: Consuelo M. Imperial, Eleanor D. Antonio, Evangeline M. Dallo, Celia D. Soriano, Maria Carmelita B. Samson
sharedBy: Hero Namora and Lyn Rose Palanog
description: A senior-high school economics worktext designed to teach fundamental economic principles, societal issues, and the application of economics concepts through real-world examples and exercises.
